data.title: Sailing Until the Ship Sinks
data.meta_description: Author Savyon Liebrecht Says She Leaves the Endings of Her Stories Open, So as Not to Impose Pessimistic Endings on the Optimistic Reader. Her Latest Collection of Stories Is About to Hit Local Bookstores
data.text:
ICYMI

The Ring of Fire Around Israel: A Look at the Arsenals of Iran, Hezbollah and the Houthis

Outpouring of Condemnations of Israeli Strikes on Gaza Disguise the World's Inaction

Welcome to Hell: B'Tselem's Ignored Abuse Report Shows Israel's True Face

What Is Really Going on in Iran While Israel Braces for Retaliation?

Israeli Soldiers in Top Secret Bases Reveal Sensitive Data Online
